habits.title: The 10-Minute Morning Reset
habits.description: Start your day with hydration, sunlight exposure, and gentle movement to set energy levels for peak performance.
habits.benefit: Improved morning energy and mental clarity

habits.title: Deep Work Sessions
habits.description: Use focused 90-minute work blocks with strategic breaks to maintain deep concentration without burnout.

habits.title: Evening Wind-Down
habits.description: Dim lights, reduce screen time, and prepare your space for quality sleep 30 minutes before bed.

habits.title: Afternoon Energy Boost
habits.description: Combat the 3 PM energy dip with a 5-minute walk, water, and a healthy snack to maintain consistent productivity.

habits.title: Distraction Elimination
habits.description: Turn off notifications, silence your phone, and close unnecessary tabs during deep work to protect your focus.

habits.title: Clean Workspace Reset
habits.description: Spend 5 minutes clearing your desk and organizing materials to create a focused, distraction-free work zone.

habits.title: Strategic Nutrition Timing
habits.description: Eat balanced meals with protein and complex carbs every 3-4 hours to stabilize blood sugar and energy levels.

habits.title: The Two-Minute Rule
habits.description: If a task takes less than two minutes, do it immediately to prevent small tasks from accumulating and draining focus.

habits.title: Optimal Lighting Setup
habits.description: Use natural light during the day and warm, dim lighting in the evening to support circadian rhythm and productivity.

habits.title: Daily Gratitude Practice
habits.description: Spend 2 minutes each morning noting three things you're grateful for to boost mood and mental resilience.

habits.title: Movement Breaks Every Hour
habits.description: Stand and stretch or take a short walk every hour to maintain circulation, mood, and mental sharpness.
habits.benefit: Better circulation and sustained mental sharpness

habits.title: Evening Reflection Journal
habits.description: Spend 5 minutes each evening reviewing wins, challenges, and lessons learned to improve continuously.

habits.title: Hydration Tracking
habits.description: Drink water consistently throughout the day to maintain cognitive function and sustained energy levels.

habits.title: Time Blocking Calendar
habits.description: Schedule specific tasks and deep work sessions into your calendar to protect focused time and increase accountability.

habits.title: Digital Detox Hour
habits.description: Designate one hour daily without screens to reduce digital fatigue and mental clutter.
habits.benefit: Reduced screen fatigue and mental clarity

habits.title: Power Nap Protocol
habits.description: Take a strategic 20-minute nap in early afternoon to restore energy and improve cognitive performance.

habits.title: Priority Matrix
habits.description: Identify your top 3 priorities each morning using the Eisenhower Matrix to focus on what truly matters.
habits.benefit: Clarity on important tasks and reduced overwhelm

habits.title: Workspace Ergonomics
habits.description: Set up your desk with proper monitor height, chair support, and keyboard position to prevent strain and fatigue.
habits.benefit: Reduced physical strain and improved comfort

habits.title: Cold Water Exposure
habits.description: Start your morning with a cold shower or splash of cold water to activate your nervous system and boost alertness.

habits.title: Mindful Meditation
habits.description: Practice 10 minutes of guided meditation daily to reduce stress, improve focus, and enhance emotional regulation.
habits.benefit: Reduced stress and improved emotional control
